trends: There have been no other sightings in Northwest Angle
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: Discharged .30-06 rifle and 12 ga. deer slug at device with no apparent effect.
divs: sighting detailsthis is still in my mind to this day, so i wanted to find out how to report it, which led me here. shape similar x-47b drone, although device would just hover with no sound like stationary in the air and was flat black like a stealth bomber. we were in fear after shortley, and trained a scoped winchester sportsman .30-06 deer rifle on the object, and fired 3 succesive shots center mass at the object, with no obvious effect, or ricochet sound. man with me fired two slugs from a mossberg 12 gauge shotgun center mass, also with no effect. we started to take off running through the woods, and the object pivoted direction and seem to float\hover north. i don not know where it went after, and never saw it again.
